subject: Received order without haptics
description_text:
Dear sir/madam,

I hope you are doing well.
I am reaching out regarding my recent order for the pedals with haptic feedback and RGB features.

Order number: SSN4178
UPS tracking: 1ZJ4555104182243430

I have received the pedals themselves, but the haptic feedback modules were not included in the package. Additionally, I only received one tracking number for the shipment, and there is no separate tracking number for the haptic feedback components.

Could you please confirm whether the haptic modules were shipped separately, and if so, provide the corresponding tracking number? If they have not yet been shipped, I would appreciate an update on the expected shipping date.

Thank you in advance for your help. I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Pim van der Aa

conversations.body_text: Hi pim van der Aa,     We ship the items separately. This is the tracking number for the other product.Â   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533500708826897

Okee, thankyou.

Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
